dcterms:creator: S. Makridakis
E. Spiliotis
V. Assimakopoulos
dcterms:description: The M4 forecasting dataset contains 100,000 time-series of different frequencies, including yearly, quarterly, monthly, weekly, daily, and hourly, used for evaluating forecasting methods.
dcterms:title: M4 forecasting dataset

dcterms:creator: S. Makridakis
E. Spiliotis
V. Assimakopoulos
dcterms:description: The M5 Competition dataset is the first in the series of M-competitions with hierarchical time-series data, focusing on improving forecasting methods.
dcterms:title: M5 Competition dataset

dcterms:creator: P. Cawood
T. L. van Zyl
dcterms:description: The COVID-19 epidemic curves dataset is used for forecasting nonseasonal time series, specifically focusing on the COVID-19 epidemic.
dcterms:title: COVID-19 epidemic curves dataset

dcterms:creator: S. Makridakis
E. Spiliotis
V. Assimakopoulos
dcterms:description: Time-series data for various domains including Economic, Finance, Demographics, etc., used for evaluating forecasting methods.
dcterms:title: Time-series data for various domains
